articles.author: By DAN SEWELL Associated Press
articles.title: Man who claimed to be missing boy expected to enter plea
articles.description: CINCINNATI (AP) — An Ohio man who claimed to be a child who disappeared at age 6 is expected to make a plea Wednesday to federal charges as part of an agreement with prosecutors.
articles.content:
CINCINNATI (AP) An Ohio man who claimed to be a child who disappeared at age 6 is expected to make a plea Wednesday to federal charges as part of an agreement with prosecutors.
A court filing this week by Kyle Healey, an assistant U.S. attorney, showed that … [+2495 chars]

articles.author: By W.G. RAMIREZ Associated Press
articles.title: Kahun, Jarry lead Penguins past Vegas 4-3
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Dominik Kahun had a goal and an assist, Tristan Jarry made 32 saves and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Vegas Golden Knights 4-3 on Tuesday night.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS (AP) Dominik Kahun had a goal and an assist, Tristan Jarry made 32 saves and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Vegas Golden Knights 4-3 on Tuesday night.
The Penguins have won three straight and six of seven on the road (6-1-0).

articles.title: Man sentenced to 10 years in prison for gun charge
articles.description: CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — A New Hampshire man was sentenced to 10 years in federal prison for possessing a gun after a felony conviction.
articles.content:
CONCORD, N.H. (AP) A New Hampshire man was sentenced to 10 years in federal prison for possessing a gun after a felony conviction.
